alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 3:25AM MST until December 14 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches along South Pass, with 1 to 2 inches expected in the northern portions of the range, including over Union Pass. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Wind River Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 PM Monday to 6 AM Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road and difficult travel conditions, including over South Pass. Blowing and drifting snow is possible, which would severely reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
